TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IChannelSender implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel

summary.span: 为发送方信道提供所需的函数和属性。

span.span: Provides required functions and properties for the sender channels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道的发送端必须公开接口。The sending side of channels must expose the interface. ## Examples [!code-cpp[IChannelSender#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelSender/CPP/ichannelsender_2_client.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IChannelSender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelSender/CS/ichannelsender_2_client.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IChannelSender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelSender/VB/ichannelsender_2_client.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink CreateMessageSink (string url, object remoteChannelData, out string objectURI);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink CreateMessageSink(string url, object remoteChannelData, [out] string& objectURI) cil managed
Public Function CreateMessageSink (url As String, remoteChannelData As Object, ByRef objectURI As String) As IMessageSink
public: System::Runtime::Remoting::Messaging::IMessageSink ^ CreateMessageSink(System::String ^ url, System::Object ^ remoteChannelData, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % objectURI);

param.name: url
param.span: 新接收器将把消息传送到的 URL。

span.span: The URL to which the new sink will deliver messages.

param.name: remoteChannelData
param.span: 新接收器将把消息传送到的远程主机的信道数据对象。

span.span: The channel data object of the remote host to which the new sink will deliver messages.

param.name: objectURI
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含新信道消息接收器的 URI，该信道消息接收器将消息传送到指定 URL 或信道数据对象。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a URI of the new channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

summary.span: 返回将消息传送到指定 URL 或信道数据对象的信道消息接收器。

span.span: Returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

returns.span: 将消息传送到指定 URL 或信道数据对象的信道消息接收器，或者如果该信道不能连接到给定的终结点，则为 。

span.span: A channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object, or if the channel cannot connect to the given endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回的通道消息接收器将消息传送到指定的 URL 或通道数据对象。The method returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to either the specified URL or the channel data object. 如果`uri`参数是`null`、`remoteChannelData`参数用作对接收器的目标。If the `uri` parameter is `null`, the `remoteChannelData` parameter is used as a target for the sink. 任一`url`参数或`remoteChannelData`参数可以为`null`，但不是两者。Either the `url` parameter or the `remoteChannelData` parameter can be `null`, but not both. ## Examples [!code-cpp[IChannelSender#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelSender/CPP/ichannelsender_2_client.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IChannelSender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelSender/CS/ichannelsender_2_client.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IChannelSender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelSender/VB/ichannelsender_2_client.vb#1)]

exception.span: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

span.span: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.

permission.span: 用于操作基础结构代码。
